title: Winter
blurb: This month we have a single session special event. etelesolv is providing the pizza and beer and Steve will bring food for thought on front-end app architecture.

speakers.title: Front-End Web App Architecture
speakers.name: Steve Venzerul
speakers.synopsis: Front-end apps are all the rage nowadays and the tool chain has never been better, but what's behind all the magic? what makes a modern front-end JS app tick? We will be looking at all those questions and much more.

links.title: Excellent e-book on developing front-end Backbone apps.
